entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
